tasks.title: Measure 1 â€“ Take the website offline
tasks.description:
### ğŸ¯ Objective

Stop malicious display, limit damage to the website, and prevent further compromise spread.

### ğŸ“Œ Actions

* Take the website offline

  * If possible, switch to maintenance mode
  * Otherwise, stop the website service (but keep the host server running)
* Preserve host servers

  * If virtual machines:

    * Pause the servers
    * Disconnect virtual network interfaces
    * Create a snapshot of the servers (disk and memory)
    * Rename the machine to MACHINE\_UNDER\_INVESTIGATION
  * If physical Windows machines, put them into hibernation
  * Otherwise, if possible, isolate the machines from the network while keeping physical, virtual, or out-of-band admin access:

    * Disable all inbound traffic from the Internet to host servers
    * Disable all outbound traffic from host servers to the Internet
  * As a last resort, power off the machine

### âœ… Deliverables

* Website taken offline and under control
* Actions documented in the **activities** of this task
